body_html: I'm sure there was some reasoning, for example since all of these functions are in the global namespace, TF_Type wouldn't be very descriptive, and might end up overloading another TF_Type in the future, etc. In any case, we'll try to be thoughtful about these interface names in the future. Thanks!
